mutants.code:
import re

def find_all_occurrences(text, word):
    """
    Returns a list of indices where the word appears in the text, 
    ignoring case-sensitivity and punctuation marks.

    Args:
    text (str): The input text.
    word (str): The word to search for.

    Returns:
    list: A list of indices where the word appears in the text.
    """
    cleaned_text = re.sub('', '', text.lower())
    words = cleaned_text.split()
    indices = [i for (i, x) in enumerate(words) if x == word.lower()]
    return indices

mutants.code:
import re

def find_all_occurrences(text, word):
    """
    Returns a list of indices where the word appears in the text, 
    ignoring case-sensitivity and punctuation marks.

    Args:
    text (str): The input text.
    word (str): The word to search for.

    Returns:
    list: A list of indices where the word appears in the text.
    """
    cleaned_text = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', 'MUTATED', text.lower())
    words = cleaned_text.split()
    indices = [i for (i, x) in enumerate(words) if x == word.lower()]
    return indices

mutants.original_line: indices = [i for i, x in enumerate(words) if x == word.lower()]  # Finding indices of the word
mutants.mutated_line: indices = [i for (i, x) in enumerate(words) if x != word.lower()]
mutants.code:
import re

def find_all_occurrences(text, word):
    """
    Returns a list of indices where the word appears in the text, 
    ignoring case-sensitivity and punctuation marks.

    Args:
    text (str): The input text.
    word (str): The word to search for.

    Returns:
    list: A list of indices where the word appears in the text.
    """
    cleaned_text = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', '', text.lower())
    words = cleaned_text.split()
    indices = [i for (i, x) in enumerate(words) if x != word.lower()]
    return indices
